                                                                                                                                                      # v-model

                                                                                                                                                      çˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶é—´é€šä¿¡ï¼Œåªèƒ½ä¼ é€’ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®ä¸äº‹ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # å…·åæ’æ§½

                                                                                                                                                      å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼šåœ¨ <slot> ä¸­æ³¨å†Œä¸€ä¸ª name å±æ€§ã€‚

  </template>

  <slot name="movie" />

  location,
  onComplete = () => {},
  onAbort = () => {}

                                                                                                                                                      # åŠ¨æ€è·¯ç”± - params

                                                                                                                                                      åœ¨è·¯ç”±é…ç½®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ ":" å ä½ã€‚å½“åŒ¹é…åˆ°è·¯ç”±æ—¶ï¼Œå‚æ•°å€¼ä¼šè¢«è®¾ç½®åˆ° $route.params ä¸­ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # Vuex

                                                                                                                                                      # å·¥ä½œæµç¨‹

                                                                                                                                                      Vuex æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ•°æ®ï¼‰ç®¡ç†æ’ä»¶ï¼Œå¯¹æ‰€æœ‰ç»„ä»¶çš„å…±äº«çŠ¶æ€è¿›è¡Œé›†ä¸­å¼ç®¡ç†ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      åŒæ­¥ï¼šcommit(type, payload) => mutations => state

                                                                                                                                                      å¼‚æ­¥ï¼šdispatch(type, payload) => actions == commit(type, payload) => mutations => state

                                                                                                                                                      # å…¨å±€æ³¨å…¥

                                                                                                                                                      åœ¨åˆ›å»º Vue å®ä¾‹æ—¶é…ç½® store é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰å†…éƒ¨ç»„ä»¶éƒ½æ³¨å…¥ä¸€ä¸ª $store å±æ€§ã€‚

  store

                                                                                                                                                      # State

                                                                                                                                                      å¦‚æœåœ¨æ’å€¼è¯­æ³•ä¸­å¤§é‡ä½¿ç”¨ $store.stateï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¼šä½¿ä»£ç çš„å¯é˜…è¯»æ€§å’Œå¯ç»´æŠ¤æ€§å˜å¾—è¾ƒå·®ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€èˆ¬ä½¿ç”¨è®¡ç®—å±æ€§è·å– store ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # mapState

                                                                                                                                                      Vuex ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æä¾›äº†ä¸€ç§ç®€ä¾¿æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ mapState è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹åº”çš„è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ã€‚

  ...mapState({
    count: "count" // this.$store.state.count => "count"

                                                                                                                                                      å½“è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ä¸çŠ¶æ€åŒåæ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç»™ mapState ä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ•°ç»„ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # Mutations

                                                                                                                                                      # æäº¤è½½è·

                                                                                                                                                      commit(type, payload)ï¼Œæ¨èæäº¤çš„è½½è·ï¼ˆpayloadï¼‰ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      methods: {
  increment() {
    // ä»¥è½½è·å½¢å¼æäº¤
    this.$store.commit("increment", { n: 2 })
    
    // ä»¥å¯¹è±¡å½¢å¼æäº¤
    this.$store.commit({ type: "increment", n: 2 })
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                      # å¤„ç†äº‹ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                      äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼š

  increment(state, { n }) {
    state.count += n
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                      # mapMutations

                                                                                                                                                      ä½¿ç”¨ mapMutations è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥å°†ç»„ä»¶ä¸­çš„ methods æ˜ å°„ä¸º store.commit è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # Getters

                                                                                                                                                      è®¡ç®—å±æ€§å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                      # mapGetters

                                                                                                                                                      æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ mapGetters è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°å°† getters æ˜ å°„åˆ°è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # Actions

                                                                                                                                                      # åˆ†å‘å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                      dispatch(type, payload)

                                                                                                                                                      methods: {
  increment() {
    this.$store.dispatch("increment", { n: 1 })
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                      # å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°

                                                                                                                                                      å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                      • contextï¼šä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå…·æœ‰ä¸ store ç›¸åŒçš„æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                      • payloadï¼šè½½è·ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                      /* store */
actions: {
  increment(context, payload) {
    setTimeout(() => {
      context.commit("incrementCount", payload)
    }, 1000)
  }
},
mutations: {
  incrementCount(state, { n }) {
    state.count += n
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                      # mapActions

                                                                                                                                                      ä½¿ç”¨ mapActions è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°å°†ç»„ä»¶ä¸­çš„ methods æ˜ å°„ä¸º store.dispatch è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

  ...mapActions(["increment"]) // this.$store.dispatch("increment") => "increment"
}

                                                                                                                                                      # Modules

                                                                                                                                                      å½“åº”ç”¨å˜å¾—éå¸¸å¤æ‚æ—¶ï¼Œstore å¯¹è±¡å°±ä¼šå˜å¾—è‡ƒè‚¿ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å°† store åˆ†å‰²æˆæ¨¡å—ï¼Œä¾¿äºä»£ç çš„ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      // countModule.js

const state = {
  count: 1
}

const actions = {
  increment(context, payload) {
    setTimeout(() => {
      context.commit("increment", payload)
    }, 2000)
  }
}

const mutations = {
  increment(state, { n }) {
    state.count += n
  }
}

export default {
  namespaced: true,
  state,
  actions,
  mutations
}

                                                                                                                                                      // store.js

import countModule from "./modules/countModule"

const movieModule = {
  // ...
}

new Vuex.Store({
  modules: {
    countModule,
    movieModule
  }
})

                                                                                                                                                      è®¿é—® state

                                                                                                                                                      // ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®
this.$store.state.countModule.count
this.$store.state.movieModule.movie

// mapState
computed: {
  ...mapState("countModule", ["count"]),
  ...mapState("movieModule", ["movie"])
}

                                                                                                                                                      è®¿é—® getters

                                                                                                                                                      // ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®
this.$store.state.countModule.countPlus
this.$store.state.movieModule.movieList

// mapGetters
computed: {
  ...mapGetters("countModule", ["countPlus"]),
  ...mapGetters("movieModule", ["movieList"])
}

                                                                                                                                                      è°ƒç”¨ dispatch

                                                                                                                                                      // ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨
this.$store.dispatch("countModule/increment", payload)
this.$store.dispatch("movieModule/getmovies", payload)

// mapActions
methods: {
  // å¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•
  ...mapActions({ increment: "countModule/increment" }),
  ...mapActions({ getmovies: "movieModule/getmovies" })
  
  // æ•°ç»„å†™æ³•
  ...mapActions("countModule", ["increment"]),
  ...mapActions("movieModule", ["getmovies"])
}

                                                                                                                                                      è°ƒç”¨ commit

                                                                                                                                                      // ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨
this.$store.commit("countModule/increment", payload)
this.$store.commit("movieModule/getmovies", payload)

// mapMutations
methods: {
  // å¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•
  ...mapMutations({ increment: "countModule/increment" }),
  ...mapMutations({ getmovies: "movieModule/getmovies" })
  
  // æ•°ç»„å†™æ³•
  ...mapMutations("countModule", ["increment"]),
  ...mapMutations("movieModule", ["getmovies"])
}

                                                                                                                                                      # Vue3 å“åº”å¼

                                                                                                                                                      # ref

                                                                                                                                                      æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå“åº”å¼çš„ ref å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      é€šè¿‡è¯¥å¯¹è±¡ä¸Š value å±æ€§å¯ä»¥æ“ä½œå“åº”å¼æ•°æ®ï¼›åœ¨æ¨¡æ¿ä¸­è®¿é—® ref å¯¹è±¡é»˜è®¤å°±æ˜¯è®¿é—®å…¶ value å±æ€§ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # reactive

                                                                                                                                                      æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›è¯¥å“åº”å¼å¯¹è±¡çš„ä»£ç†ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      import { reactive } from "vue"

interface personType {
  name: string
  age: number
  physical: {
    height: number
    weight: number
  }
  skills: string[]
}

const person = reactive<personType>({
  name: "xiaoming",
  age: 18,
  physical: {
    height: 175,
    weight: 120
  },
  skills: ["react", "vue"]
})

                                                                                                                                                      # ref vs reactive

                                                                                                                                                      • ref åˆ›å»ºçš„å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®å¯ä»¥æ˜¯åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹æˆ–å¯¹è±¡ï¼›reactive åˆ›å»ºçš„å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®åªèƒ½æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ï¼›

                                                                                                                                                      • reactive åˆ›å»ºçš„å“åº”å¼å¯¹è±¡å¦‚æœè¢«æ›¿æ¢ï¼Œå°†ä¸å…·æœ‰å“åº”å¼ï¼›

                                                                                                                                                      • ref åˆ›å»ºçš„å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®ä¿å­˜åœ¨ value å±æ€§ä¸­ï¼Œæ”¹å˜ value çš„å€¼ï¼Œä»å…·æœ‰å“åº”å¼ï¼›

                                                                                                                                                      • reactive çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                        • ref å¯¹è±¡åªèƒ½ç›‘å¬ value å±æ€§æœ¬èº«ï¼›

                                                                                                                                                        • å¦‚æœ value æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¦ç›‘å¬å…¶å†…éƒ¨å±æ€§ï¼Œéœ€ä½¿ç”¨ reactive åˆ›å»ºå¹¶è¿”å›è¯¥å¯¹è±¡çš„ä»£ç†ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # watch

                                                                                                                                                      ç›‘å¬ ref å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆåŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼‰ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯ç›‘å¬ value å±æ€§çš„æ”¹å˜ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      watch(count, () => {})

                                                                                                                                                      ç›‘å¬ ref å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›‘å¬å¯¹è±¡æœ¬èº«çš„æ”¹å˜ã€‚å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ç›‘å¬å¯¹è±¡å†…éƒ¨ç»“æ„çš„æ”¹å˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦å¼€å¯æ·±åº¦ç›‘å¬ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      watch(person, () => {}, {
  deep: true
})

                                                                                                                                                      ç›‘å¬ ref å¯¹è±¡çš„ value å±æ€§ï¼ˆåŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼‰ã€‚éœ€è¦å°†ç›‘å¬çš„æ•°æ®å†™æˆå‡½æ•°å¼å†™æ³•ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      watch(() => count.value, () => {})

                                                                                                                                                      ç›‘å¬ ref å¯¹è±¡çš„ value å±æ€§ï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹ï¼‰ã€‚ä¸éœ€è¦å†™æˆå‡½æ•°å¼å†™æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”é»˜è®¤æ·±åº¦ç›‘å¬ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      watch(count.value, () => {})

  deep: true
})

                                                                                                                                                      # computed

                                                                                                                                                      ä½¿ç”¨å‡½æ•°å¼å†™æ³•ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º get å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåªè¯»çš„ ref å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      const count = ref(1)

const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2)

                                                                                                                                                      æ¥æ”¶ get å’Œ set å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯å†™çš„ ref å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      const firstName = ref("Even")
const lastName = ref("You")

const fullName = computed({
  get: () => firstName.value + " " + lastName.value,
  set: (value) => {
    const [first, last] = value.split(" ")
    firstName.value = first
    lastName.value = last
  }
})

                                                                                                                                                      # Vue3 ç»„ä»¶é€šä¿¡

                                                                                                                                                      # defineProps

                                                                                                                                                      æ¥æ”¶çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’çš„å±æ€§ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      const props = defineProps<{
  count: number
}>()

                                                                                                                                                      # defineEmits

                                                                                                                                                      æ¥æ”¶çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼ˆå¯ä»¥ä¼ é€’åŸç”Ÿäº‹ä»¶ï¼‰ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      const emits = defineEmits<{
  (event: "changeCount", n: number): void
  (event: "update", value: string): void
}>()

// 3.3+ æ›´ç®€æ´çš„è¯­æ³•
const emits = defineEmits<{
  changeCount: [id: number] // å…·åå…ƒç»„è¯­æ³•
  update: [value: string]
}>()

emits("changeCount", 1) // count: 1 => 2
emits("update", "ts")

                                                                                                                                                      # v-model:prop

                                                                                                                                                      çˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶å¤šä¸ªæ•°æ®çš„åŒå‘ç»‘å®šã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      å½“ä½¿ç”¨ :prop + @update:prop="prop = $event" æ¨¡å¼æ—¶, å¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢ä¸º v-model:prop æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      <!-- Parent.vue -->

<Pagination v-model:count="count" />

                                                                                                                                                      <!-- Comp.vue -->
<button @click="emits('update:count', count + 1)"></button>

                                                                                                                                                      # useAttrs

                                                                                                                                                      ä½¿ç”¨ useAttrs() å¯ä»¥è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª attrs ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      attrs åŒ…å«äº†çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’çš„æ•°æ®å’Œäº‹ä»¶ã€‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ v-bind æ‰¹é‡ä¼ é€’ç»™å†…éƒ¨ç»„ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      ä¸åŒ…å«è¢« defineProps æ¥æ”¶çš„æ•°æ®å’Œè¢« defineEmits æ¥æ”¶çš„äº‹ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                      # defineExpose

  count,
  message: "hello vue"

  history: createWebHistory(),
  routes: [
    {
      path: "/",
      redirect: "/home"
    },
    {
      path: "/home",
      component: () => import("@/views/Home.vue"),
      name: "Home"
    },
    {
      path: "/:pathMatch(.*)*",
      component: () => import("@/views/NotFound.vue")
    }
  ]
})

                                                                                                                                                      # é€‰é¡¹å¼ Store

                                                                                                                                                      import { defineStore } from "pinia"

const useCounterStore = defineStore("counter", {
  state: () => ({ count: 0 }),
  getters: {
    doubleCount: state => state.count * 2
  },
  actions: {
    increment() {
      this.count++
    }
  }
})

                                                                                                                                                      # ç»„åˆå¼ Store

                                                                                                                                                      import { defineStore } from "pinia"

const useCounterStore = defineStore("counter", () => {
  const count = ref(0)
  
  const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2)
  
  const increment = () => {
    count.value++
  }
  
  return { count, doubleCount, increment }
})

                                                                                                                                                      # åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨

                                                                                                                                                      // ç”¨äºå°† store ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®è½¬ä¸º ref å¯¹è±¡
import { storeToRefs } from "pinia"

// ä» store modules å¼•å…¥ hooks å‡½æ•°
import { useCounterStore } from "@/stores/counter.ts"

// è°ƒç”¨ hooks å‡½æ•°è¿”å› store
const counterStore = useCounterStore()

// ä» store è·å–æ•°æ® (state, getters)
const { count, doubleCount } = storeToRefs(counterStore)

// ä» store è·å–æ–¹æ³• (actions)
const { increment } = counterStore
